misc: Doubles as a professional model as his side hustle
Few players dare to give him lip due to his intimidating presence and wrestling skills
biography: Olli, a formidable presence on the greens, hails from the esteemed Helsingin Golfklubi. His imposing stature and rumored wrestling prowess ensure that few dare to challenge him, adding an intriguing psychological element to his already impressive game. He is also known to dabble in professional modelling.

Olli's upcoming appearance at Hector Trophée 2025 will mark his eighth participation in this prestigious tournament. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Olli remains a steadfast competitor, continuously refining his skills and strategies.

His dedication to the sport is evident in his consistent presence at the event, making him a familiar and respected figure among players and spectators alike. Olli's pursuit of excellence and unwavering commitment make him a player to watch in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025.
